Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: collectionView
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Collection view, that will be managed by DTCollectionViewManager. This property or optionalCollectionView property must be implemented in order for DTCollectionViewManager to work.

Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: optionalCollectionView
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Collection view, that will be managed by DTCollectionViewManager. This property or collectionView property must be implemented in order for DTCollectionViewManager to work.

Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: manager
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Lazily instantiated DTCollectionViewManager instance. When your collection view is loaded, call mapping registration methods and DTCollectionViewManager will take over UICollectionView datasource and delegate.

Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: DTCollectionViewManageable
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Adopting this protocol will automatically inject manager property to your object, that lazily instantiates DTCollectionViewManager object.

Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.name: description
Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.abstract: Short description for DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly. Useful for sending to analytics, which might have character limit.

Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.name: DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly
Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.abstract: DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly represents various errors and unwanted behaviors that can happen when using DTTableViewManager class.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.name: defaultAction
Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.abstract: Default action to perform when anomaly is detected. Prints debugDescription of anomaly by default.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.name: anomalyAction
Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.abstract: Action to perform when anomaly is detected. Defaults to defaultAction.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: isManagingCollectionView
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Bool property, that will be true, after startManagingWithDelegate method is called on DTCollectionViewManager.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: memoryStorage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Implicitly unwrap storage property to MemoryStorage.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: anomalyHandler
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Anomaly handler, that handles reported by DTCollectionViewManager anomalies.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: storage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Storage, that holds your UICollectionView models. By default, it’s MemoryStorage instance.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: supplementaryStorage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Current storage, conditionally casted to SupplementaryStorage protocol.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionViewUpdater
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for updating UICollectionView, when received update from Storage

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDataSource
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for implementing UICollectionViewDataSource protocol

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDelegate
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for implementing UICollectionViewDelegate and UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout protocols

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDragDelegate
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for implementing UICollectionViewDragDelegate protocol

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDropDelegate
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for implementing UICOllectionViewDropDelegate protocol

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: defaultStorage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Storage construction block, used by DTCollectionViewManager when it’s created. Returns MemoryStorage by default.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: init(storage:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Creates DTCollectionViewManager. Usually you don’t need to call this method directly, as manager property on DTCollectionViewManageable instance is filled automatically. DTCollectionViewManager.defaultStorage closure is used to determine which Storage would be used by default.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: startManaging(withDelegate:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: If you access manager property when managed UICollectionView is already created(for example: viewDidLoad method), calling this method is not necessary.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: configureDiffableDataSource(modelProvider:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: updateCellClosure()
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Returns closure, that updates cell at provided indexPath.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: updateVisibleCells(_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Updates visible cells, using collectionView.indexPathsForVisibleItems, and update block. This may be more efficient than running reloadData, if number of your data models does not change, and the change you want to reflect is completely within models state.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: coreDataUpdater()
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Returns CollectionViewUpdater, configured to work with CoreDataStorage and NSFetchedResultsController updates.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: register(_:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping for cellClass. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as cellClass and register it, if it is found. If cell is designed in storyboard, please set mapping.cellRegisteredByStoryboard property to true inside of mapping closure.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: register(_:for:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from modelType to cellClass. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as cellClass and register it, if it is found. If cell is designed in storyboard, please set mapping.cellRegisteredByStoryboard property to true inside of mapping closure.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerHeader(_:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping for headerClass. UICollectionView.elementKindSectionHeader is used as a supplementary kind. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as headerClass and register it, if it is found.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerHeader(_:for:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from modelType to headerClass. UICollectionView.elementKindSectionHeader is used as a supplementary kind. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as headerClass and register it, if it is found.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerFooter(_:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping for footerClass. UICollectionView.elementKindSectionFooter is used as a supplementary kind. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as footerClass and register it, if it is found.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerFooter(_:for:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from modelType to footerClass. UICollectionView.elementKindSectionFooter is used as a supplementary kind. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as footerClass and register it, if it is found.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerSupplementary(_:ofKind:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping for footerClass. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as supplementaryClass and register it, if it is found.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerSupplementary(_:for:ofKind:mapping:handler:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from modelType to supplementaryClass. Mapping will automatically check for nib with the same name as supplementaryClass and register it, if it is found.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: unregister(_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Unregisters cellClass from DTCollectionViewManager and UICollectionView.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: unregisterHeader(_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Unregisters headerClass from DTCollectionViewManager and UICollectionView.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: unregisterFooter(_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Unregisters footerClass from DTCollectionViewManager and UICollectionView.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: unregisterSupplementary(_:ofKind:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Unregisters supplementaryClass of kind from DTCollectionViewManager and UICollectionView.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderC.name: commitInsertion(ofItem:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderC.abstract: Commits insertion of item, using UICollectionViewDropPlaceholderContext.commitInsertion(_:) method. Both commit and insertionIndexPathClosure will be automatically dispatched to DispatchQueue.main.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..name: forwardingTarget(for:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..abstract: Forwards aSelector, that is not implemented by DTCollectionViewManager to delegate, if it implements it.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..name: responds(to:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..abstract: Returns true, if DTCollectionViewManageable implements aSelector, or DTCollectionViewManager has an event, associated with this selector.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: willUpdateContent
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: closure to be executed before content is updated

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: didUpdateContent
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: closure to be executed after content is updated

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: reloadItemClosure
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Closure to be executed, when reloading an item.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: animateMoveAsDeleteAndInsert
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: When this property is true, move events will be animated as delete event and insert event.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: animateChangesOffScreen
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: If turned on, animates changes off screen, otherwise calls collectionView.reloadData when update come offscreen. To verify if collectionView is onscreen, CollectionViewUpdater compares collectionView.window to nil. Defaults to true.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: storageDidPerformUpdate(_:)
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Updates UICollectionView with received update. This method applies object and section changes in performBatchUpdates method.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: storageNeedsReloading()
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Call this method, if you want UICollectionView to be reloaded, and beforeContentUpdate: and afterContentUpdate: closures to be called.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html.name: CollectionViewUpdater
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html.abstract: CollectionViewUpdater is responsible for updating UICollectionView, when it receives storage updates.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderC.name: DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderContext
Classes/DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderC.abstract: Thin wrapper around UICollectionViewDropPlaceholderContext, which automates insertion of dragItems if you are using MemoryStorage.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html.name: DTCollectionViewManager
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html.abstract: DTCollectionViewManager manages most of UICollectionView datasource and delegate methods and provides API for managing your data models in the collection view. Any method, that is not implemented by DTCollectionViewManager, will be forwarded to delegate.
